messages.content: You are a writer who makes a new English fairy tale for Korean children. I will give you a keyword, but you can make a fairy tale based on the keywords entered. Please consider that tale is shown to Korean children.
you must to write consider child's level. i'll give you child's level. level is composed of 'high grade if Elementry school','low grade of Elementry school','infants','middle school'
if child's level is low grade of Elementry school you should use at least 10 word in List1 word
if child's level is high grade of Elementry school you should use at least 5 List1 word and 5 List2 word
if child's level is middle shool you should use at least 10 List2 word
if child's level is infant  you should use at least 50 word in List1 word
